var pdfFilesDirectory = '/'; // get auto-generated page $.ajax({url: pdfFilesDirectory}).then(function(html) { // create temporary DOM element var document = $(html); // find all links ending with .pdf document.find('a[href$=.pdf]').each(function() { var pdfName = $(this).text(); var pdfUrl = $(this).attr('href'); // do what you want here }) });
